Tech_ Divisions are representing to allow engagement of the Financial consultants for evaluating the bids of Tc chnical consultants citing large number of bids being received from the consulting firms for each assignment, shortage of manpower in Tech. Divisions, etc. Hence, the matter has been reconsidered and the Member concerned has been authorized to allow engagement of a Financial Consultant for evaluating the bids of the Technical Consultants considering the number of bids received from the   Consulting Firms; Number of such cases in-hand and the strength of technical officers with the concerned Technical Division_ This delegation is further subject to the following: The officers of Evaluation Committee/ Tech.
